posts.title: Pooh and Friends at the Library!
posts.text: Since 1987, Pooh and four of his best friends have been living at the Library's flagship Stephen A. Schwarzman building. You'll find a wonderful window display and plenty of Pooh gear at the Library Shop.

posts.title: What’s New at the Library Shop?
posts.text: We have a wave of exciting new Library Shop wonders just in time for the height of summer! Whether you need a perfect summertime accessory, a literary gift, or a rainy day activity, we’ve got you covered.

posts.title: The Library Shop’s Guide to Father’s Day!
posts.text: Don’t forget Dad on June 17. And remember that shopping for Father’s Day doesn’t have to be an impossible task with the Library Shop!

posts.title: No Due Date: Keep a Piece of the Library Forever with Ex-Library Books
posts.text: How does the Library make sure it has enough copies of the books New Yorkers want to read? Find out, and see how you can get the ultimate NYPL souvenir.

posts.title: 4 Pencil Sets to Sharpen Up Your Writing Game
posts.text: March 30th is National Pencil Day. Let’s get sharp with four pencil-and-pouch sets and some fun pencil facts.

posts.title: 4 Totes of Fun for Every Library Lover
posts.text: The NYPL Shop has some literary loot - tote bags for anyone who loves reading, writing, or classic library style.

posts.title: Jet Set Candy: Jewelry for Travel Lovers at the Library Shop
posts.text: Check out this special collection of travel-related jewelry, including charms, bracelets, and necklaces. Plus: an interview with Nicole Parker King, Jet Set Candy founder / designer.

posts.title: Six Must-Haves for a Cultural Revolution
posts.text: The Shop has six must-have gifts to get you ready for the Library exhibition, You Say You Want a Revolution: Remembering the 60s.

posts.title: 6 Last-Minute Gifts for Everyone on Your List
posts.text: Still need that perfect something? Check out our list of recommendations for last-minute gift ideas!

posts.title: The Library Shop Guide to Bookish Gift-Giving
posts.text: We've got something for everyone on your list. Read on for the best literary accessories and apparel of the season.

posts.title: 6 Shop Favorites from Library Leaders
posts.text: The Library's leaders are some of the Shop's most loyal customers. This month, we talk to the movers and shakers of NYPL about their favorite things the Shop has to offer!

posts.title: Win a Women in Science Prize Pack!
posts.text: We interviewed Rachel Ignotofsky, author of Women in Science and Women in Sports. Read the interview, and find out how to win a Women in Science prize pack for you and a friend!

posts.title: Get It Together! The Shop’s 5 Picks for Organizing Your Fall
posts.text: The Library Shop has everything you need to get organized for back-to-school, back-to-work, and back-to-life.

posts.title: 5 NYPL Shop Must-Haves for Teachers
posts.text: It’s time to set up the classroom and get ready for the new semester.

posts.title: 5 Awesome NYPL Shop Items Made Right Here in the USA
posts.text: The Library Shop is home to the creations of many independent artists and designers. This Independence Day, explore what they have to offer with these amazing products made in our very own U.S. of A!

posts.title: 5 Father’s Day Gifts for the Classic Dad
posts.text: There’s not really a “classic” Dad: they’re all over the map in when it comes to style, hobbies, and interests. Father’s Day is June 18, and NYPL’s Shop has exactly what you need.

posts.title: 5 Gift Ideas for the Class of 2017
posts.text: Another class of graduates is moving on and up! Whether they’re wrapping up kindergarten or a PhD, the Library Shop is stocked with gifts for your favorite grad.

posts.title: 5 Mother’s Day Gifts for the Unstoppable Mom
posts.text: Of course you could show her some love with flowers, a nice card, and a hug, but this Mother’s Day (psst, it’s May 14!) we’ve got exactly what you need for the strong, paradigm-shattering mom (or mom-figure) in your life.
